chapter.text: You decide to look for something to do to give your mind a break. ^1500You see many games, many attractions, yet you lack the means to play any of them. ^1500Missing guns at the gun range, missing rings at the ring toss, and even missing ramps to get on the rides prevent you from enjoying yourself in any way here. ^1500You even decide to jump the counter of one of the food stands to look for ingredients, but the fridges and cabinets are all empty. ^1500You give up, and keep walking.
